value.string:
<tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 /* Search popup fix*/
 div.search_popup{
 left:200px;
 position:absolute;
 top:-120px;
 width:250px;
 }
 
 
 /******************/ 
 /* Listbox action */
 /******************/
 .listbox-action-widget {
 float:none;
 }
 .listbox-action-widget div.bottom_actions{
 float:left;
 background-color:#E0DFD1;
 padding-left:0.5em;
 padding-bottom:0.2em;
 }
 
 /* Title of the bar */
 .listbox_actions_title{
 color:#FFFFFF;
 display:block;
 font-size:15px;
 text-align:left;
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 
 }
 
 /* Sub container for the buttons*/
 .buttons_group {
 margin-right:30px;
 padding-top:3px;
 width:auto;
 overflow: auto;
 }
 
 /* Buttons */
 .listbox-action-widget button, .listbox-action-widget a.button {
 background-image: url('./km_img/button_background.png') ;
 background-position: 100% 0;
 background-color: inherit;
 border:0 none;
 color:#5F5A55;
 cursor:pointer;
 height:27px;
 float:left;
 margin-right:3px;
 margin-bottom:3px;
 width: auto;
 }
 .listbox-action-widget button:hover,.listbox-action-widget a:hover {
 background-position:100% 100%;
 }
 
 /* a as button */
 .listbox-action-widget a.button{
 display:block;
 margin-left: 9px;
 }
 
 /* Image in button */
 .listbox-action-widget span.image{
 background-repeat:no-repeat;
 background-position:center center;
 display:block;
 position:relative;
 float:left;
 height:20px;
 width:20px;
 margin-top:3px;
 z-index:2;
 left:-5px;
 }
 
 /* Description of botton */
 .listbox-action-widget span.description{
 font-size:10px;
 }
 
 /* Global button span */
 .listbox-action-widget button > span, .listbox-action-widget a > span{
 display:block;
 background-color:inherit;
 background-image:url('./km_img/button_background.png');
 background-position:0 0;
 display:block;
 height:27px;
 left:-8px;
 line-height:27px;
 margin:0;
 padding:0 0 0 5px;
 position:relative;
 white-space:nowrap;
 width:100%;
 }
 .listbox-action-widget button:hover > span, .listbox-action-widget a:hover > span{
 background-position:0 100%;
 }
 .listbox-action-widget span.description span {
 left:4px;
 position:relative;
 }
 
 /*Define all button image*/
 <tal:block tal:define="buttons python: ['cut','copy','paste','delete','print','new','reset','filter','find','sort','config']">
 <tal:block tal:repeat ="button buttons">
 <tal:block tal:content="python: '''
 .%(button)s_button span.image{
 background-image:url('./km_img/%(button)s.png');
 }''' % {'button':button}"
 />
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 
 /*********************/
 /* Listbox style (XXX: move to erp5.css) */
 /*********************/
 div.listbox-container{
 width: 100%;
 }
 
 div.listbox-tree {
 margin-right: 4px;
 width: auto;
 float: left;
 }
 
 div.listbox-content{
 float: left; 
 }
 
 div.listbox-head{
 color:#9D968D;
 font-weight:bold;
 margin-bottom: 10px;
 }
 
 div.listbox-body{
 width:auto;
 }
 
 div.listbox-tree-mode-selection{
 height: 22px;
 width: auto;
 float: left;
 }
 
 div.listbox-tree-mode-selection input{
 width: auto;
 }
 
 th.listbox-table-report-tree-selection-cell{
 width: 50px; 
 }
 
 div.listbox-footer{
 background-color:#F0EFE9;
 float:left;
 margin-bottom:0.3em;
 margin-top:0.3em;
 padding-left:0.2em;
 
 }
 
 /* Listbox Footer in gadget mode */
 .block .listbox-footer{
 background-color: transparent;
 }
 
 div.listbox-footer-box {
 width: auto;
 float:left;
 min-height:28px;
 }
 
 /* List style selection */
 div.listbox-list-style-selection {
 width:auto;
 float:left;
 }
 div.listbox-list-style-selection span{
 font-weight:bold;
 padding-left:10px;
 vertical-align:-4px;
 }
 div.listbox-list-style-selection ul{
 display:inline;
 padding-left:0;
 margin: 0;
 vertical-align: -4px;
 }
 div.listbox-list-style-selection li{
 display: inline;
 }
 div.listbox-list-style-selection li a.selected,
 .listbox-table-report-tree-selection-cell a.selected,
 .listbox-table-domain-tree-cell a.selected,
 .listbox-page-navigation-text a.selected{
 font-weight: bold;
 }
 
 /* Listbox full text search bar */
 div.listbox-full-text-search {
 float:left;
 margin-top:0;
 padding:0em 0.5em;
 width: auto;
 }
 div.listbox-full-text-search input{
 width: 130px;
 }
 div.listbox-full-text-search input.button{
 background-image: url('./km_img/search_background.png');
 background-color: inherit;
 border: 0 none;
 color:#FFFFFF;
 width: auto;
 }
 
 /* Listbox Pagination*/
 div.listbox-page-navigation button{
 background-color:transparent;
 border: none;
 cursor: pointer;
 }
 div.listbox-page-navigation button span.image{
 display:block;
 height:8px;
 width:5px;
 background-repeat:no-repeat;
 }
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation button.listbox_first_page span.image {
 background-image:url("km_img/2leftarrowv.png");
 }
 div.listbox-page-navigation button.listbox_previous_page span.image {
 background-image:url("km_img/1leftarrowv.png");
 }
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation button.listbox_next_page span.image {
 background-image:url("km_img/1rightarrowv.png");
 }
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation button.listbox_last_page span.image {
 background-image:url("km_img/2rightarrowv.png");
 }
 
 
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation-slider{
 width:auto;
 margin:auto;
 padding-right: 0.5em;
 float:right;
 }
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation-slider input{
 max-width: 30px;
 }
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation-text{
 width:100%;
 float:left;
 text-align:center;
 }
 
 div.listbox-page-navigation-text a{
 padding-right: 1px;
 color: #9D968D;
 cursor: pointer;
 }
 
 
 /* Report tree */
 a.tree-closed {
 background:transparent url('./images/tree_closed.png') no-repeat scroll left center;
 padding-left:15px;
 }
 
 a.tree-open {
 background:transparent url('./images/tree_open.png') no-repeat scroll left center;
 padding-left:15px;
 }
 
 div.listbox-tree select{
 max-width:120px;
 }
 
 /*Table Listbox elements */
 table.listbox{
 border-collapse:collapse;
 width:100%;
 }
 
 table.listbox th,
 table.listbox td {
 text-align:left;
 vertical-align: top;
 }
 
 table.listbox th button{
 border-width:0;
 cursor:pointer;
 float:left;
 font-weight:bold;
 padding:0 6px 0 0;
 }
 
 /* KM specific */
 table.listbox th button.sort-button {
 background:transparent url("../km_img/switch.png") no-repeat scroll 100% 50%;
 }
 table.listbox th button.sort-button:hover{
 color: #FFF;
 }
 table.listbox th button.sort-button-desc{
 background-image: url('./km_img/switch_desc.png');
 }
 table.listbox th button.sort-button-asc{
 background-image: url('./km_img/switch_asc.png');
 }
 
 /* KM specific */
 .listbox-search-line, .listbox-label-line{
 background-color: #F0EFE9;
 }
 
 .listbox-search-line th{
 background-color: inherit;
 }
 
 /* in search mode listbox may contain top/ bottom quick search inputs */
 div.search-text-listbox{
 text-align: center;
 float:left;
 height:auto; 
 margin-bottom:0.5em;
 margin-top:0.5em;
 }
 
 div.search-text-listbox input{
 width: auto;
 }
